articles.title: Cash-flush Americans lift U.S. retail sales; shortages depress auto purchases - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. retail sales unexpectedly increased in June as demand for goods remained strong even as spending is shifting back to services, supporting expectations that economic growth accelerated in the second quarter.
